title: Iron imp
data:
{{version030}}
{{monster info}}
==Useful Info==
'''Iron imps''' are relatively burly [[tier-5 demon]]s. They have the most [[HP]] of all the imps and decent attacks, but they're slow, and almost never appear where they'd actually be a threat. They can only be found as part of certain [[vault]]s.

==Tips & Tricks==
*If you're concerned about them being a threat in melee, they're easy to [[kite]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.30]], they could be created by [[Call Imp]]. Of the imps summoned by that spell, they were the physically toughest.
*Prior to [[0.7]], iron imps were called '''manes''', a name that was both singular and plural.

[[Category:Demon]]
